statements: DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE flagged_by_user = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1000 AND flagged_by_user = 'admin';
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 5000 AND flag_reason LIKE 'Fraud%';
DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = '987654' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount >= 1000 AND flagged = true;
DELETE FROM flagging_transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2021-10-01' AND transaction_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM flag_mappings WHERE flag_id = 2002 AND transaction_id = 3003;
DELETE FROM flag_mappings WHERE flag_id = 1 AND transaction_id = 1000;
